message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $100. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $110 for this exceptional item. This offer allows us both to benefit - you receive a valuable product at a fair price, and I ensure a satisfactory return on my investment. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.
